product_name: Mountain House Just In Case Essential Freeze-Dried Food Bucket
long_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Essential Freeze-Dried Food Bucket makes it easy to keep a total of 32 per-person servings of food on hand for emergencies or camping. Perfect for emergency preparedness, camping, backpacking or at-home use, the easy-to-store, clear bucket lets you easily see the contents. Includes 4 pouches (12 servings) of rice & chicken, 4 pouches (10 servings) of chili mac with beef and 4 pouches (10 servings) of spaghetti with meat sauce. Meals are easy to prepare-just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. The Mountain House Just In Case Essential Freeze-Dried Food Bucket requires a total of 24 cups of water (not included) to make all the meals. Nutrition facts and spec info are based on one serving of chili mac with beef.
short_description: The Mountain House Just In Case Essential Freeze-Dried Food Bucket makes it easy to keep a total of 32 per-person servings of food on hand for emergencies or camping.
